description.narrative: UNICEF ECA expanded its voice, reach and engagement through the continued growth of its social media presence; support to provide platforms for young people to amplify their voices, through signature events such as CRC@30 observations, adolescent media networks and U-Report; high level advocacy with policy makers; and engagement of members of the public through the use of traditional media channels. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of people reached through digital assets of UNICEF (unique website visitors, social media supporters and subscribers, mobile initiatives)
Number of adolescents advocating through networks (Adolescent Media and U-Report-TT)
Number of people reached through offline events (conference, training, etc.) in the context of country priorities
Number of returning users to UNICEF's website and/or blogs
